document_data.name: Ornthalas Alastrarra
document_data.mainbody: '''Ornthalas Alastrarra''' was an [[elven]] inhabitant of [[Cormanthor]] from at least the 3{{rd}} to the 7{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Ornthalas had a propensity for nonchalant witticism that got on the nerves of his elders.
document_data.Description: Iymbryl remembered him as young, handsome, and haughty-looking.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor||2}} In person, he was proud and youthful.
document_data.History:
In {{yearlink|241}}, [[Iymbryl Alastrarra]] sent [[Elminster Aumar]] to [[Cormanthor]], bearing his own ''[[kiira]]'', to deliver it upon his brother Ornthalas. At his home, Ornthalas was summoned to find a man in the likeness of Iymbryl holding his sister, [[Filaurel Alastrarra]], as a shield, before a gathering of his immediate family. After the man released Filaurel, he delivered the ''kiira'' unto Ornthalas; it bonded quickly, but painfully.

Once he bore the ''kiira'', Ornthalas was supportive of Elminster being taken before the [[Coronal]] so that no stain came upon the honor of their family.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor||5}}
document_data.Relationships: [[Riluaneth]] often teased if not outright tormented him. He was the heir after the death of his brother, Iymbryl. He was the third son of Namryiitha Alastrarra.
